        public AbstractValidityChecker​(X509Certificate certificate,
                               X509Certificate issuer,
                               String id,
                               PropertyChangeListener... propertyChangeListeners)
        Constructor
        Parameters:
        certificate - the target certificate being validated
        issuer - issuer certificate for the CA issuign the target certificate
        id - event id being returned as the property name to registered listeners.
        propertyChangeListeners - optional listeners when performing validation as a Runnable class
